ygData.msgSnippet: Havotron turned to the Constructicons. DID YOU NOT HERE ME.... he screamed.  COMBINE NOW  He said in an extremely threatning voice. Scrapper once again

Subject: Decepticon Civil War/Retreat from the Auto's
Message-ID: <3B62F4B1.20255.60E5C57@localhost>
Priority: normal
X-mailer: Pegasus Mail for Win32 (v3.12c)
From: gunthers@...

Havotron turned to the Constructicons. "DID YOU NOT HERE 
ME...." he screamed.  "COMBINE NOW"  He said in an extremely 
threatning voice.  

Scrapper once again looked to Hook, a little confused at what to do.

Needlenose looked to Firestrike who was now standing and 
walking towards Havotron.  

Firestrike thought to himself. "This is perfect, Havotron can find 
Megatron, then they can defeat each other leaving no one to take 
control, and finally the Decepticons will rule with no leader, but one 
united  body."

He walked closer to Havotron.  "You search for Megatron, he fled, 
into the depths behind me, you could probably still catch him" 
Firestrike said with a smirk on his face.
